verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Dera, laza, hery, haja
Ho an'Andriamanitra,
Tompon'aina, Zanahary,
Rain'ny voninahitra.
Izy no Mpanao antsika
Sady ivelomana ;
Fototr'aina, foto-tsoa,
Izy ivavahana.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
Hihira isika hoe :
Haleloia !
Dera ho an'Andriamanitra
Dia Haleloia ! (in-2)
Haleloia ! (in-4)
Hihira isika hoe :
Haleloia !
Dera ho an'Andriamanitra

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ray Tsitoha, tsy miova,
Tia sy mamindra fo,
Mahasoa isan'andro,
Izy no isaorana ;
Vatolampy tsy mifindra,
Tokin'olombelona ;
Fiarova-mahavonjy,
Izy itokiana :
Hihira isika, sns.
